meta.job_title: IT Infrastructure Architect / IT Systems Engineer

skills.skill: Data Visualization/Platform Management (Qlik, Tableau, Power BI)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide strategic guidance for Data Visualization/Platform Team to steer Qlik, Tableau, and Power BI platforms, focusing on product ownership and administration.
Lead and manage the migration of BI tools to the cloud, with a focus on AWS operations and foundational IT skills including Linux and Windows operations, basic networking, and SQL knowledge.
Manage offshore vendor relationships, delegate work packages, and collaborate with operations team and customers, demonstrating leadership and strong communication skills.
Architect and design high-quality IT infrastructure solutions and platforms, ensuring technical security, performance, and system availability.
Communicate and document architectural decisions, plans, and functional requirements, serving as the IT architect and technical lead for end-to-end system implementation.
Contribute to BI Target Enterprise Architecture, propose new standards, and monitor technical metrics to ensure system quality and performance.
Run and manage complex IT projects, ensuring timely completion within budget and providing project management support for client IT projects.
Stay updated on technical trends and innovations, applying this knowledge to drive future changes and improvements.

education_certification.credential: BS degree in IT field or equivalent of 4 years related experience in Information Technology
